p:
Mean water depth in nesting ponds ranged from 14.3 to 27.8 cm (mean = 21.4 cm, SD = 4.21). Mean water depth in nesting ponds exhibited a relationship with sunspot number (
β ^
= −0.038, SE = 0.009, t = −4.172, p = .001), proportion of days that remained below freezing on the breeding grounds during November–March (
β ^
= 44.838, SE = 15.078, t = 2.974, p = .012), and total precipitation on the breeding grounds during November–March (
β ^
= −0.555, SE = 0.265, t = −2.096, p = .058). Whooping crane recruitment increased as pond depth increased (odds ratio = 1.097,
β ^
= 0.093, SE = 0.021, p < .001).
